t: Amazon.com: Mariani Premium Dried Fruit

s: I have bought the Mariani's brand for many years to make a local treat in Hawai'i called "Prune Mui" and I am always pleased with the freshness of the dried apricots! Highly recommend this brand and their product!

t: Amazon.com: Mariani Premium Mixed Fruit Plus! 2.25lbs : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Three problems here. First, for decades Mariani was a straight-ahead company that sold quality dried fruit, period. Lately though they're dosing their fruit with enhancements (that's the "Plus") of one kind or another; what kind of mentality thinks beautiful dried fruit NEEDS enhancement?
